data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 23017, Version Hash: ff85ea5ba61f12b4cac137b048a25ed0dd5648de
data.actual_result: The bar which marks your cursor's location flashes/flickers at uneven, random intervals which have significant changes.
data.expected_result: The flashing/flickering, as I believe, is supposed to flash/flicker at an even, constant rate between intervals.
data.short_description: Cursor location flashing/flickering vertical thin bar is flashing/flickering at uneven intervals.
data.steps_to_repro: - Look at the message bar at the bottom of the screen where it says "Message #nameOfTextChannel" - Look at the flickering bar where it marks your cursor's location - Observe the rate at which it clickers
